item.title: Brad Pitt accuses ex-wife Angelina Jolie of sabotaging their winery’s reputation on purpose
item.dc:creator: Akash
item.description:
Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie, who have been married for 12 years, purchased a vineyard and château in southern France in 2008. Brad Pitt is reportedly suing his ex-wife Angelina Jolie, claiming that she willfully sought to ‘inflict harm’ on the reputation of their previously co-owned winery, Miraval, by selling her interests to a stranger.’ […]

Brad Pitt accuses ex-wife Angelina Jolie of sabotaging their winery’s reputation on purpose
item.content:encoded:
Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie, who have been married for 12 years, purchased a vineyard and château in southern France in 2008.

Brad Pitt is reportedly suing his ex-wife Angelina Jolie, claiming that she willfully sought to ‘inflict harm’ on the reputation of their previously co-owned winery, Miraval, by selling her interests to a stranger.’ According to People, the Once Upon a Time in Hollywood star recently filed documents in Los Angeles County Superior Court. Since their divorce over five years ago, the ex-couple has been at war over the wine vineyard.

Brad Pitt with Angelina Jolie

In 2008, the ex-couple purchased a vineyard and château in the south of France after a 12-year relationship. The Mr. and Mrs. Smith costars were married on the property, together with their six children. However, according to the outlet, Brad Pitt’s lawyers claim that when Jolie sold her shares to a Luxembourg-based spirits manufacturer owned by Russian billionaire Yuri Shefler, she intended to harm the reputation of ‘the brand Pitt so carefully built.’

According to the site, Brad Pitt’s filings contain a claim that the couple agreed not to sell shares of their co-owned properties without first telling the other party and allege a breach of contract between Pitt’s firm, Mondo Bongo, and Jolie’s company, Nouvel. According to the BBC, Jolie did inform Pitt of her ‘sad’ choice to sell in January 2021. Brad Pitt also claims in the complaint that Jolie contributed ‘nothing to [Château] Miraval’s success.’

According to the lawsuit, Pitt was the one who converted the winery ‘into a multimillion-dollar global corporation and one of the world’s most highly acclaimed manufacturers of rosé wine.’ Pitt requests that damages be determined at a jury trial and that the sale be declared null and void because he thinks Shefler’s presence in the former couple’s wine business will degrade his work.

Meanwhile, a source told the outlet, “Mr Pitt’s lawsuit against Ms Jolie is an extension of a false narrative, and the truth of the situation has still not been made public. After the events that led to Ms Jolie filing for divorce and her years devoted to caring for their children, Ms Jolie and the children have not been able to return to the property, and she made the difficult decision to sell her stake in the business.”

The source went on to say, “After making multiple offers to her ex-husband, and knowing the business will be inherited by their children, she found a business partner with experience in the alcohol industry.” The source adds, “It’s unfortunate that after she properly and legally exited the business, Mr Pitt is entangling her in multiple lawsuits.”

Brad Pitt accuses ex-wife Angelina Jolie of sabotaging their winery’s reputation on purpose

item.dc:creator: Prashant Chaudhary

Dr. Stone Season 3 episode 5 will air soon on Crunchyroll. In the upcoming episode, we will learn about whether or not Senku’s family will be able to make bread in the ancient world with no forest products. Dr.STONE NEW WORLD (Season 3)Episode-4 Preview Stills. pic.twitter.com/f0SH1BiQnO — Shonenleaks (@sh0nenleaks) April 26, 2023 Dr. Stone is […]

Dr. Stone Season 3 Episode 5 Release Date, Preview, Spoilers, Watch Online, and More
item.content:encoded:
Dr. Stone Season 3 episode 5 will air soon on Crunchyroll. In the upcoming episode, we will learn about whether or not Senku’s family will be able to make bread in the ancient world with no forest products.

Dr.STONE NEW WORLD (Season 3)
Episode-4 Preview Stills. pic.twitter.com/f0SH1BiQnO

— Shonenleaks (@sh0nenleaks) April 26, 2023

Dr. Stone is a popular animated series that explores the narrative of light converting all living beings on Earth into stone and resetting society for hundreds of centuries.

The protagonist of the anime series, Ishigami Senkuu, has to revive and restore human civilization with his capabilities and skills.

Dr. Stone Season 3 Episode 5 Release Date Announced!

Dr. Stone Season 3 Episode 5 release date has been scheduled for this Thursday, May 4th, 2023. The episode will be broadcasted locally in Japan at 22:30 JST on Japan TV and other TV and OTT platforms.

Moreover, it will be available to stream internationally at different times.

  • Greenwich Standard Time: Sunday, May 4, 12:30 am
  • Indian Standard Time: Sunday, May 4, 12:30 am
  • Japanese Standard Time: Saturday, May 4, 10:30 pm
  • Eastern Standard Time: Sunday, May 4, 12:30 am
  • Philippine Standard Time: Sunday, May 4, 12:30 am
  • Australia Central Standard Time: Sunday, May 4, 12:30 am
  • Korean Standard Time: Sunday, May 4, 12:30 am

What is the Plotline of Episode 5 of Dr. Stone Season 3?

The plotline of Dr. Stone Season 3 Episode 5 has not been revealed yet. The story of episode 5 will pick up from where episode 4 left off.

What Happened in the Dr. Stone Season 3 Episode 4?

Dr. Stone: New World | Season 3 Episode 4 Preview pic.twitter.com/ctpwLXXv6l

— Kolaz (@KolazPV) April 26, 2023

In episode 4 of Dr. Stone Season 3, Senku used his advanced skills and technology skills to search for oil in the medieval era.

He used multiple hot air balloons equipped with a camera to take pictures of the island. Senku’s inventions and intelligence helped improve the island’s agriculture and crop production.

Where to Watch Dr. Stone Season 3 Episode 5 Online?

The Dr. Stone Season 3 Episode 5 will be available to watch on Crunchyroll. Fans of the anime series need to subscribe to Crunchyroll’s monthly plan in order to watch the series online on their devices.

Dr. Stone Season 3 Episode 5 Release Date, Preview, Spoilers, Watch Online, and More

item.title: “Our show is in no way a moral tale to teach people how to live their life.”: Zendaya claps back at Euphoria critics
item.dc:creator: Simranjit
item.description:
In January 2022, the Drug Abuse Resistance Education program, or D.A.R.E. called out the hit HBO teen drama Euphoria for its depiction of drug use, sex, and violence. Zendaya, who plays one of the lead characters on the show, strongly responded to critics. But what did she say? D.A.R.E. takes a dig at Euphoria Euphoria, […]

“Our show is in no way a moral tale to teach people how to live their life.”: Zendaya claps back at Euphoria critics
item.content:encoded:
In January 2022, the Drug Abuse Resistance Education program, or D.A.R.E. called out the hit HBO teen drama Euphoria for its depiction of drug use, sex, and violence. Zendaya, who plays one of the lead characters on the show, strongly responded to critics. But what did she say?

D.A.R.E. takes a dig at Euphoria

Euphoria, which premiered in 2019, follows Rue (played by Zendaya), a high school student struggling with addiction amid relationships, friendships, and her home life.

D.A.R.E which was established in the 1980s during the Ronald Reagan-era “war on drugs,” advocates for a zero-tolerance policy on drugs. The organization said in a statement against the show,

“Rather than further each parent’s desire to keep their children safe from the potentially horrific consequences of drug abuse and other high-risk behavior, HBO’s television drama, ‘Euphoria,’ chooses to misguidedly glorify and erroneously depict high school student drug use, addiction, anonymous sex, violence, and other destructive behaviors as common and widespread in today’s world,”

D.A.R.E added it would like to consult with representatives of the show to present its concerns.

The statement further reads,

“It is unfortunate that HBO, social media, television program reviewers, and paid advertising have chosen to refer to the show as ‘groundbreaking,’ rather than recognizing the potential negative consequences on school age children who today face unparalleled risks and mental health challenges,”

Zendaya responds to critics

A month after the statement from D.A.R.E and growing criticism against the show, Zendaya responded.

Now, the actress, who happens to be an executive producer on the series, posted a statement on social media warning viewers that the show could be triggering to some and emphasizing that it is for mature audiences.

She said,

“I know I’ve said this before, but I do want to reiterate to everyone that Euphoria is for mature audiences. This season, maybe even more so than the last, is deeply emotional and deals with subject matter that can be triggering and difficult to watch,”

She added that viewers should “only watch it if you feel comfortable.”

Zendaya posted a similar warning before the show’s debut in 2019 saying,

“Just a reminder before tonight’s premiere, that Euphoria is for mature audiences. It’s a raw and honest portrait of addiction, anxiety, and the difficulties of navigating life today. There are scenes that are graphic, hard to watch, and can be triggering. Please only watch if you feel you can handle it.”

The show also makes it a point to run a disclaimer about mental health with a phone number for the National Alliance of Mental Health runs ahead of episodes dealing with mental health issues.

While HBO did not respond to critics, Zendaya told Entertainment Weekly that people should not be modeling their lives after Rue. She stated,

“Our show is in no way a moral tale to teach people how to live their life or what they should be doing. If anything, the feeling behind Euphoria, or whatever we have always been trying to do with it, is to hopefully help people feel a little bit less alone in their experience and their pain. And maybe feel like they’re not the only one going through or dealing with what they’re dealing with.”

What are your thoughts? Does Euphoria promote addiction and drug use or is it helping today’s youth cope with mental health issues such as depression and anxiety? Let us know in the comments. Don’t forget to follow hiptoro for the latest celebrity news and gossip.

Source: Entertainment Weekly

“Our show is in no way a moral tale to teach people how to live their life.”: Zendaya claps back at Euphoria critics

item.title: Bam Margera tests negative for M*th, says he’s “done” with drinking too
item.dc:creator: Simranjit
item.description:
Bam Margera posted a new video in which he says some mean things about his family. But, as this is reported, Lamar Odom offered Bam Margera a free stay at one of his addiction treatment centers. Bam Margera says he heard about Lamar’s offer and will take him up on it.   Bam Margera says […]

Bam Margera tests negative for M*th, says he’s “done” with drinking too
item.content:encoded:
Bam Margera posted a new video in which he says some mean things about his family. But, as this is reported, Lamar Odom offered Bam Margera a free stay at one of his addiction treatment centers. Bam Margera says he heard about Lamar’s offer and will take him up on it.

 

Bam Margera says he’s given up drinking because of some scary things that happened in his personal life.

He also says he tested negative for m*th after his brother said he was hooked on the dangerous drug.

Bam Margera put out a series of statements Friday, first saying,

Well my brother made false accusations of me being on m*th. But when I wear to god and Phoenix the wolfs life I’m not, I went with my lawyers to urgent care. Guess what Jesse margera. The results are negative. Now you will be evicted from castlebam sooner than later. Get your f***in s*** out HOMOner. Oh wait… not no more.

Jess said that Bam was on m*th and hallucinating earlier this week when he was still on the run from the police. This really got under Bam’s skin, and he hasn’t stopped talking about it since. Bam denied these claims and told Jess that he would sue him for slander and kick him out of his house.

Bam also says he’s done drinking for the sake of his son, Phoenix.

I have been through official termoil with my family.

He also thanked his current girlfriend, Jessica, for being there for him during his recent problems.

For once I am not dating a hot dog strutting floozy.

He praised Jessica for helping him hire Michael van der Veen as an attorney to help him with his ongoing case with his brother.

Finally, Bam takes a shot at his ex-wife, Missy Margera, whom he thinks tried to help the police find him while he was on the run last week.

As reported, Bam turned himself in to the police on Thursday. He had been on the run for four days after his brother told the police that Bam beat him up and threatened to kill him.

Bam Margera tests negative for M*th, says he’s “done” with drinking too

item.title: Somebody Somewhere Season 3 Release Date Update: Has the HBO Comedy Show Been Renewed or Canceled?
item.dc:creator: Prashant Chaudhary
item.description:
Fans of the popular American comedy-drama are waiting for the Somebody Somewhere Season 3 release date update. Since it has been a question whether or not the HBO comedy-drama TV series will be renewed or not, fans are eagerly waiting for an official announcement for the renewal of Somebody Somewhere. Somebody Somewhere is a popular […]

Somebody Somewhere Season 3 Release Date Update: Has the HBO Comedy Show Been Renewed or Canceled?
item.content:encoded:
Fans of the popular American comedy-drama are waiting for the Somebody Somewhere Season 3 release date update. Since it has been a question whether or not the HBO comedy-drama TV series will be renewed or not, fans are eagerly waiting for an official announcement for the renewal of Somebody Somewhere.

Somebody Somewhere is a popular HBO drama-comedy TV series that features a star-studded cast, which includes Bridget Everett, Mary Catherine Garrison, Jeff Hiller, and more.

The series follows Sam, who doesn’t fit in her hometown. She has a passion for singing and is on a discovery with a community of outsiders who don’t give up.

In Somebody Somewhere Season 2, Sam and her buddy Joel have settled into a comfortable routine, but a huge change is on the way.

Has Somebody Somewhere Been Renewed or Canceled?

As of 30th April, 2023, HBO has not made any official announcement whether the show will be renewed for season 3 or canceled. But by looking at the ratings of season 2, we can expect another season in the series.

Season 2 had taken a massive jump from season 1 in terms of ratings. A total of 50% viewership of the show has been increased in season 2. This is a good indicator that the show might get renewed for season 3.

Is There A Release Date for Somebody Somewhere Season 3?

No, as of now, there is no release date for season 3 of Somebody Somewhere. HBO has not officially renewed the show yet, but in the near future, we can expect the release date announcement.

Where to Watch Somebody Somewhere Season 3 Online?

It will be available to stream online on HBO Max. Fans can also watch the series offline on the HBO TV channel in the United States. But fans residing outside the US will need to use a VPN to stream the HBO Max comedy-drama series.

Somebody Somewhere Season 3 Release Date Update: Has the HBO Comedy Show Been Renewed or Canceled?

item.title: Watch Suzume Online: How to Stream the New Hit Anime Movie by Makoto Shinkai?
item.dc:creator: Charlie
item.description:
How to watch ‘Suzume’? – Makoto Shinkai gained worldwide recognition after his 2016 anime movie ‘Your Name’ became a mega-hit. Prior to this, anime movies were mostly associated with the gentle beauty of Studio Ghibli. But ‘Your Name’ not only showcased Shinkai’s breathtaking visuals and incredibly detailed storytelling but also made everyone aware that his […]

Watch Suzume Online: How to Stream the New Hit Anime Movie by Makoto Shinkai?
item.content:encoded:
How to watch ‘Suzume’? – Makoto Shinkai gained worldwide recognition after his 2016 anime movie ‘Your Name’ became a mega-hit. Prior to this, anime movies were mostly associated with the gentle beauty of Studio Ghibli. But ‘Your Name’ not only showcased Shinkai’s breathtaking visuals and incredibly detailed storytelling but also made everyone aware that his future projects were a must-see.

After the success of ‘Your Name,’ Makoto Shinkai’s 2019 project ‘Weathering With You’ didn’t quite live up to the hype but still showcased his remarkable storytelling skills. Now, with his latest film Suzume no Tojimari, Shinkai promises yet another exciting and emotionally engaging adventure.

In Shinkai’s latest film, Suzume, a 17-year-old girl encounters a mysterious young man who speaks of a door in her quiet town of Kyushu. She soon discovers a weathered door standing tall among ruins, and as she reaches for the knob, doors begin to open all across Japan, causing destruction and chaos. She discovers that she possesses a unique ability to close these portals and prevent further devastation. The film features stunning visuals of the stars, sunsets, and morning sky that guide Suzume on her perilous journey to close the doors and save Japan.

The movie has been well-received by both critics and audiences alike. It’s a captivating story of adventure and self-discovery, with reviewers praising its dazzling visuals and emotional depth.

Suzume Voice Cast

Suzume, like Shinkai’s previous works, features a star-studded voice cast. Nanoka Hara takes the lead as Suzume Iwato, while Hokuto Matsumura, Eri Fukatsu, and Hakuo Matsumoto play supporting roles. Other notable cast members include Shôta Sometani, Sairi Itô, Kotone Hanase, and Kana Hanazawa.

Is ‘Suzume’ playing in movie theatres?

Absolutely! The new film from Makoto Shinkai has been released in a limited number of movie theatres across the United States starting from April 14th, 2023. The global release of the film is set to expand in the upcoming weeks. To check theatre listings or purchase tickets for the movie, you can visit Fandango’s website.

How to watch ‘Suzume’ Online?

At the moment, there’s no news of the new hit movie being available for streaming anywhere. The distributors have chosen to have an exclusive theatrical release, given Shinkai’s popularity.

However, there’s a slight chance that the movie may be released on Crunchyroll in a few months. Although there’s no confirmation yet, considering that Crunchyroll previously released Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero in theaters and on their website, we may expect the same and expect it to release by the end of the year.

Keep an eye on this space for further updates as we receive more information.

Watch the trailer for Suzume:

Also Read- Hell’s Paradise Review: Is the Anime Worth Watching?

Watch Suzume Online: How to Stream the New Hit Anime Movie by Makoto Shinkai?

item.title: One Piece Film Red Blu Ray and Crunchyroll Release date and More Updates
item.dc:creator: Charlie
item.description:
One Piece Film Red was a blockbuster hit last year, elevating the franchise’s already high status. The Blu-Ray release of the film is being handled by Crunchyroll, which also oversaw its theatrical run. The company has ambitious plans for the release, which will include exciting new features for fans of the Straw Hat Pirates. One […]

One Piece Film Red Blu Ray and Crunchyroll Release date and More Updates
item.content:encoded:
One Piece Film Red was a blockbuster hit last year, elevating the franchise’s already high status. The Blu-Ray release of the film is being handled by Crunchyroll, which also oversaw its theatrical run. The company has ambitious plans for the release, which will include exciting new features for fans of the Straw Hat Pirates.

One Piece Film Red Blu-Ray Release Date

The Blu-Ray release of One Piece Film Red is scheduled for July 11, 2023, with a full North-American release. Fans can expect a premium-sleeved edition, which will include both dubbed and subtitled versions of the film, as well as three special anime series episodes that are tied to the feature. Although the movie first premiered last year, the upcoming Blu-Ray release is sure to be a must-have for any Straw Hat Pirates enthusiast, as it will contain plenty of exciting features.

The Blu-Ray release of One Piece Film Red will also include three special anime series episodes. These episodes delve deeper into the characters and the lore of the film. Titled “A Faint Memory! Luffy and Red-Haired’s Daughter Uta!” (episode 1029), “A Pledge for the New Genesis! Luffy and Uta!” (episode 1030), and “The Captain’s Log of the Legend! ‘Red-Haired’ Shanks!” (a clip-show episode between episodes 1030 and 1031), the episodes will help fans better understand the story and the characters.

One Piece Film Red is the fifteenth feature film of the One Piece franchise. The film tells the story of Monkey D. Luffy and his Straw Hat Pirates as they journey to meet Uta, a world-famous singer connected to Red-Haired Shanks. With a focus on music, the film combines established One Piece characters with a self-contained story. Released in 2022, Film Red is the highest-grossing of all the series features and is one of the most commercially successful anime films of all time, as well as one of the most successful Japanese films, animated or live-action.

CrunchyrollCrunchyroll is set to release several physical versions of their home video and theatrical divisions in July. On July 4, Season 13, “Voyage 1” of One Piece and the second season of Obey Me! will be released. July 18 will see the release of the second season of The Devil is a Part-Timer and the second set of OVA episodes for The Ancient Magus’ Bride, “The Boy from the West and the Knight of the Mountain Haze.” Fans of Crunchyroll are in for a busy summer with all of these releases.

Watch the Trailer for One Piece Film Red:

Also Read- Netflix One Piece Live Action Movie Release Date, Spoilers, Plot, Cast, and More

One Piece Film Red Blu Ray and Crunchyroll Release date and More Updates

item.title: Nick Cannon expresses joy over “Red Table Talk” cancellation, calls it “Toxic Table”
item.dc:creator: Simranjit
item.description:
Nick Cannon seems pretty happy that “Red Table Talk,” Jada Pinkett Smith’s talk show is over. at least for now. During a segment of his new live radio show, The Daily Cannon, the 42-year-old host was honest about how he felt about the show being canceled and Will Smith’s many roles over the years. Meta […]

Nick Cannon expresses joy over “Red Table Talk” cancellation, calls it “Toxic Table”
item.content:encoded:
Nick Cannon seems pretty happy that “Red Table Talk,” Jada Pinkett Smith’s talk show is over. at least for now.

During a segment of his new live radio show, The Daily Cannon, the 42-year-old host was honest about how he felt about the show being canceled and Will Smith’s many roles over the years.

Meta said on Thursday that they would be shutting down Facebook Watch. This means that the popular talk show will no longer be available. Nick Cannon said that the new development was “good,” and then he said that Jada and Will’s public talk about their marriage on RTT led to the “King Richard” actor’s famous outburst at the 2022 Oscars.

If there was no Red Table Talk, then he wouldn’t have slapped the s— out of Chris Rock,

The “Wild N’ Out” alum was referring to the “slap heard ’round the world” after Rock made a joke about Jada’s shaved head during the ceremony.

 

Even though Nick Cannon’s co-hosts Courtney Bee Bledsoe and Abby De La Rosa said how much they liked the show, Cannon called it the “toxic table.”

That was royalty, Will and Jada. Then they brought it to the table,” he said of Smith’s frequent appearances on the program. “I don’t want to know all this s— about y’all.

One of the most famous sit-down interviews with the “Fresh Prince of Bel-Air” star was in 2020, when he and his wife talked about private parts of their marriage and Pinkett-Smith’s “romantic entanglement” with August Alsina, a friend of their son Jaden Smith. Even though the two said they were no longer together at the time, the interview still went viral online.

They made all them memes about my brother Will, they didn’t need to do that,

said, Nick Cannon.

I just want to mind my Black-owned business. I don’t want to be up in everybody else’s kitchen. Keep that s— to y’all selves.

 

F— that table,

he also exclaimed.

Three generations of the Smith family, including Jada’s daughter Willow Smith and her mother Adrienne Banfield-Norris, cohosted her show. They talked about hot topics around the table, which was the name of the show. After Meta’s announcement, the show said they were “in talks of finding a new home” and told fans,

we’ll see you soon.

Nick Cannon expresses joy over “Red Table Talk” cancellation, calls it “Toxic Table”

media:content.media:title: Nick Cannon expresses joy over "Red Table Talk" cancellation, calls it "Toxic Table"
media:content.media:description: Nick Cannon seems pretty happy that "Red Table Talk," Jada Pinkett Smith's talk show is over. at least for now.

item.title: Netflix Sweet Tooth Season 3: Will The Show Be Renewed After Season 2 Ending?
item.dc:creator: Charlie
item.description:
Sweet Tooth season 3 is not yet officially confirmed by Netflix, but fans are eagerly anticipating its announcement. The second season of the show just premiered on April 27, 2022, and fans have already finished watching all the new episodes. Season 2 of the show has been received positively by fans and critics, and the […]

Netflix Sweet Tooth Season 3: Will The Show Be Renewed After Season 2 Ending?
item.content:encoded:
Sweet Tooth season 3 is not yet officially confirmed by Netflix, but fans are eagerly anticipating its announcement. The second season of the show just premiered on April 27, 2022, and fans have already finished watching all the new episodes. Season 2 of the show has been received positively by fans and critics, and the show has already got a loyal fanbase.

Sweet Tooth season 3 could be a possibility as fans are eagerly waiting for more after the second season’s epic ending. In the second season, the story saw Gus and other hybrids captured and imprisoned by General Abbot and his mercenaries. Jepperd and Aimee team up to save them while Dr. Singh works to find a cure for the virus. With so many plot threads left hanging, fans are speculating and hoping for a third season to wrap everything up. However, there hasn’t been an official announcement about the renewal yet.

SWEET TOOTH SEASON 2 IS SO GOOD 🦌 THERE BETTER BE A SEASON 3

— Andrei O'Hara 💜 (@TheAndreiNDC) April 28, 2023

Is Sweet Tooth season 3 happening?

As of April 27, Netflix has not renewed Sweet Tooth for a third season, and while some shows are given early renewals, Sweet Tooth was not one of them. However, fans should worry yet, as the streaming platform does not always renew shows early.

It’s possible that we’ll have to wait for about a month before we hear any official word from Netflix about a Sweet Tooth season 3. The streaming giant needs to evaluate the show’s viewership numbers during the first month after release to determine its success. High viewing hours during this time could increase the likelihood of renewal. However, completion rates are also significant; viewers must watch all eight episodes of the second season for it to count.

With how the second season ended, a third season of Sweet Tooth is possible. But we’re waiting for Netflix’s approval. There’s still more story to tell.

Spread the word about Sweet Tooth season 2 while we wait for news on a potential season 3. Letting more people know about the show can increase the likelihood of its renewal. We’ll keep you posted when there’s an update.

Also Read – Netflix Stranger Things Canceled: Why Is There No Season 6?

Netflix Sweet Tooth Season 3: Will The Show Be Renewed After Season 2 Ending?

media:content.media:title: Netflix Sweet Tooth Season 3: Will The Show Be Renewed After Season 2 Ending?

item.title: “He’s very sweet!”: Zendaya’s Euphoria ‘Mom’ Nika King Approves of Boy Friend Tom Holland
item.dc:creator: Simranjit
item.description:
Tom Holland and Zendaya are currently the most talked about couple in Hollywood right now. After winning the heart of Zendaya’s family, it now looks like the Spider-Man star has won the heart of Zendaya’s on-screen mom, Nika King. Nika King is a fan of Tom Nika, 44, plays Leslie Bennett to Zendaya’s troubled drug […]

“He’s very sweet!”: Zendaya’s Euphoria ‘Mom’ Nika King Approves of Boy Friend Tom Holland
item.content:encoded:
Tom Holland and Zendaya are currently the most talked about couple in Hollywood right now. After winning the heart of Zendaya’s family, it now looks like the Spider-Man star has won the heart of Zendaya’s on-screen mom, Nika King.

Nika King is a fan of Tom

Nika, 44, plays Leslie Bennett to Zendaya’s troubled drug addict Rue in HBO’s shock teen drama Euphoria. She revealed that she became a fan of the Spider-Man star after she met him at her co-star’s house.

King told Page Six,

“I’ve met Tom. He’s come over to her house when they have dinners and stuff like that. He’s very sweet, very nice.”

She clarified she didn’t know the extent of the couple’s relationship saying,

“And I don’t know what the extent of their relationship [is] but they always look happy, they always look like they’re enjoying themselves. And I’m just like, look, whenever I see love, I’m here for it.”

King talks about Zendaya

Tom Holland and Sendaya have been together since 2017 when they co-starred in “Spider-Man: Homecoming,” him as the titular hero and her in the role of his love interest, Michelle Jones-Watson, aka MJ.

King believes Holland is among Zendaya’s “good core of people.” According to her this helps keep the former Disney star grounded despite her insurmountable fame.

Nika King explains,

“She has a good core of people around her and I think that’s also important. She keeps her clique pretty small.”

She continues,

“So she’s learned through probably the same — just like we all do — trial and error, or having different people come into your life just to say, ‘OK, this is the tribe and I trust this tribe.’”

Nika King reflects on her own journey in Hollywood

Observing Zendaya’s star rise over the years has provided King an opportunity to reflect on her own journey in Hollywood. Though she’s been steadily working for decades — as an actress, model and comedian — the multi-hyphenate is grateful to have achieved her celebrity later in life.

King says,

“I’m glad it took as long as it did because if I would have gotten success early, I’m pretty sure I would’ve been somewhere strung out on drugs because it’ll suck you in if you don’t have a strong core or a foundation of who you are,”

She continued,

“No one can tell me who I am because I’ve had so many years to kind of go through the, ‘Oh, my hair isn’t straight enough, oh, my nose is not [thin] enough, oh, my complexion, I need to be more ambiguous.’”

King proudly shares that she’s happy the way she is and is no longer searching for anyone’s validation.

King says she doesn’t care for the criticism she sustained in the early days of her career, oftentimes rooted in misogyny and racism. She said,

“All of those things don’t affect me now because I’ve been through those things. I feel so much stronger and confident today because of it.”

Nika King is a philanthropist

Nika King’s self-worth is bolstered by her philanthropic efforts. Last year, she launched Rose of Sharon, a nonprofit inspired by her mother’s battles with addiction, cancer and mental health to benefit those in the black community experiencing similar struggles.


King said,

“There are stigmas in our community surrounding all of these issues that I want to help erase. I love my people.”

What are your thoughts on Nika King? Do let us know in the comments. Also, make sure to follow Hiptoro for the latest celebrity news and gossip.

Source: Page  Six
